alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:11PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Comanche, northwestern Cotton, south central Kiowa and northeastern Tillman Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 610 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Manitou to 9 miles south of Indiahoma to 3 miles southeast of Chattanooga. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and reduced visibility due to blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Cache, Geronimo, Chattanooga, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Manitou, Faxon, Meers, Lake Lawtonka, Fort Sill, Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, Mount Scott, Doris Campground, and The Visitor Center. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 26 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
